mapper.update:
UPDATE data_player_re_club SET
data_player_re_club.ClubId = #{ clubId },
data_player_re_club.ClubHistoryId = #{ clubHistoryId },
data_player_re_club.PlayerId = #{ playerId },
data_player_re_club.LeagueType = #{ leagueType },
data_player_re_club.PlayerNumber = #{ playerNumber },
data_player_re_club.PlayerNumberIcon = #{ playerNumberIcon },
data_player_re_club.Position = #{ position },
data_player_re_club.PositionNumber = #{ positionNumber },
data_player_re_club.Avatar = #{ avatar },
data_player_re_club.Weight = #{ weight },
data_player_re_club.Height = #{ height },
data_player_re_club.Year = #{ year },
data_player_re_club.EndYear = #{ endYear },
data_player_re_club.IsLastServed = #{ isLastServed },
data_player_re_club.Onfield = #{ onfield },
data_player_re_club.OnfieldLast = #{ onfieldLast },
data_player_re_club.Goals = #{ goals },
data_player_re_club.ShootTimes = #{ shootTimes },
data_player_re_club.AssistTimes = #{ assistTimes },
data_player_re_club.YellowTimes = #{ yellowTimes },
data_player_re_club.RedTimes = #{ redTimes },
data_player_re_club.SerialNumber = #{ serialNumber },
data_player_re_club.CreatedAt = #{ createdAt },
data_player_re_club.UpdatedAt = #{ updatedAt }
WHERE id= #{id}
